projects.name: RealMock
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered mock interview named Realmock platform by using the Google's Gemini API, incorporating both video and audio elements to create a highly realistic and immersive interview experience. It generates customized interview questions with a 90% accuracy rate based on the specific job description and provides detailed feedback with a 80% efficiency rate, offering precise and constructive insights into user responses. The platform offers strategic tips and personalized recommendations covering body language and technical knowledge to help users improve their interview performance.

projects.name: Attendify
projects.description: Developed a Next.js-powered student attendance tracking website, engineered to automate attendance recording and enhance accuracy through database storage and advanced filtering capabilities. Effortlessly visualize attendance data using intuitive graphs and pie charts, which provide a clear and comprehensive overview by achieving 85% accuracy ensures reliable insights for informed analysis. My vision is to transform this project into a comprehensive college attendance management system, aiming for a systematic approach that enhances efficiency and transparency.

projects.name: Ticket Reservation UI
projects.description: Clear Information Architecture: Imagine your UI like a well-organized store. Users can easily find what they're looking for with clear categories, labels, and intuitive menus. No more hunting for the 'buy tickets' button! Minimal Steps: Booking a ticket should feel like a quick conversation by 75%, not a paperwork marathon. The UI guides users through the process with minimal steps, eliminating unnecessary clicks and forms.

projects.name: Slot Booking Management
projects.description: Efficiently implement a vaccine slot booking system that enables convenient online appointment scheduling, significantly reducing physical queues by 80% and minimizing wait times at vaccination sites. It provides nationwide access to multiple vaccination centers, allowing users to book vaccines from any location in the country by providing filtering options facilitate center selection based on user preferences. Integration of EmailJS enhances user experience by sending immediate confirmation emails upon slot booking and these emails include a unique booking ID, ensuring users have a reference for their appointment details.

experiences.description: Acquired proficiency in new technologies and implemented innovative approaches, leading to a 30% increase in system efficiency and also engaged in cross-functional collaboration and enhancing teamwork by 60%. Analyzed and documented corporate operations during my internship; gained comprehensive understanding of business functions and professional environments, enhancing ability to contribute effectively in future roles.
